verses.text: Ephraim feeds \w on|strong="H1004"\w* wind, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* chases \w the|strong="H5437"\w* east wind. \w He|strong="H1004"\w* continually multiplies \w lies|strong="H3585"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* desolation. \w They|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5437"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Assyria, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* oil \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w carried|strong="H5437"\w* \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Egypt.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* controversy \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Judah, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* punish Jacob according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ways; according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* repay \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brother \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heel, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* manhood \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w contended|strong="H7379"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
Indeed, he struggled \w with|strong="H8280"\w* the angel, and prevailed; he wept, and made supplication to him. He found him at Bethel, and there he spoke \w with|strong="H8280"\w* us—

even \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* Armies. \w The|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H4672"\w* name \w of|strong="H4397"\w* renown!

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. Keep kindness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wait \w continually|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w A|strong="H3068"\w* merchant \w has|strong="H4941"\w* dishonest scales \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* hand. \w He|strong="H7725"\w* loves \w to|strong="H7725"\w* defraud.

Ephraim said, “Surely \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w become|strong="H3027"\w* rich. \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* found myself wealth. \w In|strong="H3027"\w* all \w my|strong="H3027"\w* wealth \w they|strong="H3027"\w* won’t find \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3027"\w* any iniquity \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* sin.”

“\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* again make \w you|strong="H3605"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H4672"\w* tents, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* solemn feast.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* spoken \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* multiplied visions; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ministry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* used parables.

If Gilead \w is|strong="H3027"\w* wicked, surely \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* worthless. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* Gilgal \w they|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifice bulls. Indeed, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* altars \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* heaps \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* furrows \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field.

Jacob fled \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Aram. Israel \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* get \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w he|strong="H5921"\w* tended flocks \w and|strong="H4196"\w* herds.

\w By|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* up out \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w*.

Ephraim \w has|strong="H3068"\w* bitterly provoked anger. \w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* blood \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*\f + \fr 12:14 \ft The word translated “Lord” is “Adonai.”\f* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* repay \w his|strong="H8104"\w* contempt.
